perturbation.original_text: Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC ("HDS"), a Delaware corporation, and Paul Silas ("Celebrity), an individual.
perturbation.changed_text: Healthcare Distribution Specialists LLC ("Company"), a Delaware corporation, and Paul Silas ("Celebrity), an individual.
perturbation.explanation: The document uses 'HDS' and 'Company' interchangeably without clearly defining if they are the same entity. This could lead to confusion regarding which entity is responsible for certain obligations.

perturbation.original_text: A. In a television commercial (specific spot length to be mutually agreed upon) promoting Clotamin ("Commercial") aired specifically in the following three (3) television markets: (1) Washington, DC Metro Area; (2) Florida; and (3) Texas (collectively "Markets");
perturbation.changed_text: A. In a television advertisement (specific spot length to be mutually agreed upon) promoting Clotamin ("Spot") aired specifically in the following three (3) television markets: (1) Washington, DC Metro Area; (2) Florida; and (3) Texas (collectively "Locations");
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Commercial" is now referred to as "Spot" and the term "Markets" is referred to as "Locations." By changing these terms, it is unclear if the defined terms are still the same, leading to potential disputes on the content and where it will air.

perturbation.original_text: B. Celebrity will serve as a member of the Clotamin/HDS Board of Advisors, whose members' sole responsibility is to be listed as a Clotamin brand ambassador on the Website and/or Clotamin related press releases. With respect to the Board of Advisors, Celebrity will not be responsible for any additional services such as attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.
perturbation.changed_text: B. Celebrity will serve as a member of the Clotamin/Company Advisory Group, whose members' sole responsibility is to be listed as a Clotamin brand ambassador on the Website and/or Clotamin related press releases. With respect to the Advisory Group, Celebrity will be responsible for attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'HDS Board of Advisors' to 'Company Advisory Group' and in the next sentence going from 'not be responsible' to 'be responsible' is creating a contradicting obligation.
